description:
Effortless toggle customization with flexible styling to match your projectâ€™s style guide. 

Key features include:

Layout Options: Choose between circular or rectangular styles to fit your design needs.
Color Customization: Easily set the color of the background and handle, allowing for seamless integration with your project's color scheme.
Border Styling: Customize the border color to enhance the visual appeal of the toggle.
Auto-Binding Support: The toggle supports auto-binding, ensuring smooth integration and automatic updates with your data.
Multiple Instances: Supports multiple instances on the same page, each with different layouts and customizations.
name: Easy Toggle
plugin_instructions:
Simply drag the toggle component and set it's styling properties to meet your design. 


Supports workflows of when toggle is clicked and when toggle value has changed
